backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor data models for content generation features and initializes access control and per-user storage maps.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature implementations with associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels for onboarding-related features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of various frontend generator, onboarding, and layout files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variables and dark mode color definitions for global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, global layout, theme provider, and onboarding/profile modals.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGuard.t: Protects routes by checking authentication state and rendering login prompts when needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Handles Internet Identity login/logout logic with UI feedback and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/calendar/Calenda: Modal dialog for creating calendar posts, capturing metadata and saving via backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/generators/Capti: UI for generating caption variants based on user inputs and saving or copying results.
frontend/src/components/generators/HookG: Generates video hooks using topic, tone, and categories, with options to copy or save them.
frontend/src/components/generators/ReelI: Creates reel ideas using niche, audience, style, length, and CTA, and allows saving results.
frontend/src/components/generators/Scrip: Builds full video scripts with hook, setup, payoff, and CTA, and supports saving them as ideas.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout with header navigation, footer, and authenticated user controls.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Onboa: Automatically redirects authenticated users to onboarding if they haven't completed it.
Displays a list of onboarding feature sections with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter name, niche, and bio, then saves their profile via a mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches the backend actor based on identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Returns user identity, profile, and flags indicating authentication and whether profile setup is required.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, loading, login, and logout handling via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls with React Query for fetching and mutating user profiles, ideas, hooks, stories, and trends.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom light and dark theme CSS variables for the app’s color system.
frontend/src/lib/captionGenerator.ts: Generates caption variants with emojis, styles, and optional hashtags, returning them as StoryIdea objects.
frontend/src/lib/hookGenerator.ts: Builds VideoHook entries by filling templates using the topic and selected categories, mapping each to hook types.
frontend/src/lib/onboardingStorage.ts: Provides helpers to read, write, and reset onboarding completion state in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/reelIdeasGenerator.ts: Generates reel ideas using template-based titles, premises, beats, and metadata for different niches and styles.
frontend/src/lib/scriptGenerator.ts: Creates a structured video script with a hook, setup, payoff, CTA, and editing suggestions using templates.
frontend/src/lib/trendGenerator.ts: Builds trend candidates from keywords by generating titles, descriptions, scores, and metadata for multiple trend categories.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider before rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/CalendarPage.tsx: Displays a monthly or list-view content calendar with scheduled posts and supports adding new entries via a dialog.
frontend/src/pages/GeneratorsPage.tsx: Hosts tabs for reel ideas, hooks, captions, and script generators within a unified UI page.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the marketing landing page with hero content, feature list, and navigation to tools based on authentication.
frontend/src/pages/LibraryPage.tsx: Renders a tabbed library view showing saved ideas, hooks, captions, and trends, loading data from user-specific query hooks. Displays counts, timestamps, and item details with conditional empty states.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Shows an onboarding welcome screen with feature highlights and lets users mark onboarding complete before navigating to the generators page.
frontend/src/pages/TrendsPage.tsx: Provides a trend watchlist and generation workflow where users add keywords, generate trend candidates, and save selected trends to their library.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based query removal.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme extensions, colors, animations, plugins, and content paths for the project.
project_state.json: Tracks the project’s feature set, versions, and requirements for an AI-driven content generator platform.
